TabStream tab ( const unsigned int  num_tabs  )  [inline]

Prints multiple tabs on an output stream. Example: cout << tab(3) << "This text will be tabbed over thrice.";

Definition at line 118 of file util.h.

std::ostream& tab ( std::ostream &  os  )  [inline]

Prints a tab character on an output stream. Allows cout << tab << "text"; Slightly easier readability than using "\t" inside the message.

See also:
tab()
